title: Kitty Kat Rengar? Yes.
body:
you know you wanna Rito...
but really though his bola is made of yarn, has cardboard box armor. 
ultimate is stealth under a cardboard box.
I'd pay money for this *wink*

think of the kittens... and the money.....

here is a rough design

Concept Tofu4u2
art Roar Tea 99

replies.body: Now that's a cat Schrodinger will regret putting in a box.
this comment deserves its own reward
the nobel prize

Schrodinger's Rengar

legendary skin
Instead of an exclamation point his R should put a laser pointer moving around over people.
yaaaaaaas

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=840262&d=1385566595

Battle Bunny is better.

Idea: YES PLS. 

That representation of the Idea: PLS NO! MAKE IT STOP! MY EYES, MY EYES!
I would main rengar for this skin
maybe if rengar wasn't a trash tier champ

> [{quoted}](name=AetherKingdom,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=E41RjxMG,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-26T17:44:32.435+0000)
>
> maybe if rengar wasn't a trash tier champ

Are you dumb?
I mained Rengar season 3-4. he's trash

> [{quoted}](name=AetherKingdom,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=E41RjxMG,comment-id=000400010000,timestamp=2015-03-26T23:53:59.464+0000)
>
> I mained Rengar season 3-4. he's trash

Are you bronze 6?
aetherkingdom is one of the biggest trolls on boards. Most things he says, just let it go.
I mean everything that I say

Your so opinionated in a certain direction that it makes you seem like you are either A) toxic FOTM fanboy or B) just a troll. Sometimes you bring up valid arguments, but most of the time you ask for the downvotes. In this case, rengar is by no means a top tier jungler, but is still very good in certain team comps etc. I do feel like the jungle changes have made him a better top laner, which is where I play him, but there is no reason to call him a trash tier jungler when he is still very manageable.
He suffers from "FotM Syndrome", where if something isn't FotM or Lee Sin, it must be useless.

I'm plat 3.
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Tisio
Uh... he's not.

He is. I haven't lost a ranked game to a rengar this entire season.
And i mained him season four
I mained him, and now i don't lose to him. your correlation factor here is null.
As one of my favorite top laners, I support this.
Honestly I'm still banking on Bargain Hunter Rengar (pleeeeease riot), but this looks cute.
THAT IS AN AWESOME CONCEPT
schrodinger's {{champion:107}} , till you {{item:2043}} the bush, he is both in and not in the bush.

I would buy this. It even has a reference to Metal Gear Solid.

Worst concept art ever....
how?
I don't play renger, i don't like rengar and I don't like this skin, because I love it!
